attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why cant Asthmatics have free prescriptions .
Both my Husband and my 15 year old daughter are Asthmatics.At the moment those who suffer from Asthma (not children) have to fork out on their prescriptions., which is nearly £7 per item .Most Asthmatics have 2 or more inhalers to take.Those who know about Asthma ,knows it can be a life threatening illness. So why cant Asthmatics have free prescriptions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
